alert.note: Alert for Coal; Hughes; Pontotoc (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 8:33PM CDT until September 23 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Coal County in southeastern Oklahoma... East central Pontotoc County in east central Oklahoma... Southern Hughes County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 832 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Allen, moving southeast at 25 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR GERTY! HAZARD...Three inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Allen and Gerty. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...3.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
